rev.desc.rev.desc: recompile
set field "Depend Filename" from "probsummary" to "problem" in panel "link.rootcause"
changed "asset" to "CI" in the message on build.sql.device

removed the matching for known errors and changed it so that when opening an incident from a call the matching will only be done agains other incidents. When opening an incident from the incident menu then the macthing will be done against the incident and problem table.
changed queries for Known Errors and Rootcause (Problem Management) to follow the new table names:
panel: patch.ke
changed expression from:
if ($L.kesql="" or $L.kesql=NULL) then ($L.kesql="open=true and State=\"rca.knownerror.view\"") else ($L.kesql=$L.kesql+" and open=true and State=\"rca.knownerror.view\"")
to
if ($L.kesql="" or $L.kesql=NULL) then ($L.kesql="open=true") else ($L.kesql=$L.kesql+" and open=true")
panel: patch.rc
changed expression from:
if ($L.rcsql="" or $L.rcsql=NULL) then ($L.rcsql="open=true and State=\"rca.view\"") else ($L.rcsql=$L.rcsql+" and open=true and State=\"rca.view\"")
to
if ($L.rcsql="" or $L.rcsql=NULL) then ($L.rcsql="open=true") else ($L.rcsql=$L.rcsql+" and open=true")
Modified to show correct Problem/Known Error format based on phase record and fixed message when associating Incidents to Problems or Known Errors.
Modified so that queries on rootcause dbdict (Root cause or Known Error) only select records where open=true (active records).
Update for BUG10591 Changed message output to after decide.display.
BUG10591 added messages to inform users to select an existing ticket from the list, or add a new one. The messages are based on asset or parent relationships.
Changed link.rootcause to call us.save.relation instead of apm.save.association.
Fixed error condition that could happen if a problem no longer exists or has a broken index.
Fixed the order of the exits on decide.exit so that the link and exit functionality works.
Fixed a logic error caused by misplaced parentheses that caused certain incident matching settings to throw an unrecoverable error.
ST21560 modified start panel did other two lines.
Modified title on qbe screen to show what type of records the user is looking at.
Modified so that the correct filename would be passed to screlation record in apm.save.association.
ST21560 modified start panel as indicated by Iris
Changed the string lioption("ir expert") to lioption("IR Expert") in panel start.
Corrected parameter passed to message 109. From number in $L.problem TO id in $L.problem
Added a "back" exit.
Changed filename check from "problem" to "probsummary"

The values of the State field for Known Errors should be rca.knownerror.view instead of knownerror. For Root Cause, it should be rca.view instead of rootcause. Changes made in panels patch.ke and patch.rc.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Converted to use scmsg().
Setup $pmc.actions and $pmc.details before displaying the problem ticket. Also fixed NULL cancel exit on apm.edit.problem panel.
made new license code work
Used new license code
Modified to use the new apm.get.related.query instead of the less generic apm.get.parent.query

descript.descript: recompile
set field "Depend Filename" from "probsummary" to "problem" in panel "link.rootcause"
changed "asset" to "CI" in the message on build.sql.device

removed the matching for known errors and changed it so that when opening an incident from a call the matching will only be done agains other incidents. When opening an incident from the incident menu then the macthing will be done against the incident and problem table.
changed queries for Known Errors and Rootcause (Problem Management) to follow the new table names:
panel: patch.ke
changed expression from:
if ($L.kesql="" or $L.kesql=NULL) then ($L.kesql="open=true and State=\"rca.knownerror.view\"") else ($L.kesql=$L.kesql+" and open=true and State=\"rca.knownerror.view\"")
to
if ($L.kesql="" or $L.kesql=NULL) then ($L.kesql="open=true") else ($L.kesql=$L.kesql+" and open=true")
panel: patch.rc
changed expression from:
if ($L.rcsql="" or $L.rcsql=NULL) then ($L.rcsql="open=true and State=\"rca.view\"") else ($L.rcsql=$L.rcsql+" and open=true and State=\"rca.view\"")
to
if ($L.rcsql="" or $L.rcsql=NULL) then ($L.rcsql="open=true") else ($L.rcsql=$L.rcsql+" and open=true")
Modified to show correct Problem/Known Error format based on phase record and fixed message when associating Incidents to Problems or Known Errors.
Modified so that queries on rootcause dbdict (Root cause or Known Error) only select records where open=true (active records).
Update for BUG10591 Changed message output to after decide.display.
BUG10591 added messages to inform users to select an existing ticket from the list, or add a new one. The messages are based on asset or parent relationships.
Changed link.rootcause to call us.save.relation instead of apm.save.association.
Fixed error condition that could happen if a problem no longer exists or has a broken index.
Fixed the order of the exits on decide.exit so that the link and exit functionality works.
Fixed a logic error caused by misplaced parentheses that caused certain incident matching settings to throw an unrecoverable error.
ST21560 modified start panel did other two lines.
Modified title on qbe screen to show what type of records the user is looking at.
Modified so that the correct filename would be passed to screlation record in apm.save.association.

Changed the string lioption("ir expert") to lioption("IR Expert") in panel start.
Corrected parameter passed to message 109. From number in $L.problem TO id in $L.problem
Added a "back" exit.
Changed filename check from "problem" to "probsummary"

The values of the State field for Known Errors should be rca.knownerror.view instead of knownerror. For Root Cause, it should be rca.view instead of rootcause. Changes made in panels patch.ke and patch.rc.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Converted to use scmsg().
Setup $pmc.actions and $pmc.details before displaying the problem ticket. Also fixed NULL cancel exit on apm.edit.problem panel.
made new license code work
Used new license code
Modified to use the new apm.get.related.query instead of the less generic apm.get.parent.query
